title: Half a Million Dollars (Person of Interest)(1 x 14)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: @Person of Interest Highlights.....THX for this awesome video. I'm getting goosebumbs when I see John Reeses eyes. They are so beautiful and yet can be so frightening when he wants them to be. Jim Caviezel has the ability to use his impressive eyes in such a powerful way as I have never seen before. I love it! <3 <3<<3
description:
John interrogates a grunt on the location of a murder weapon.
